name: cats;portals
description:
A prototype of a 3d platformer about a magical cat traveling across different worlds.

Current features:

- platforming with jumping and dashing, autoclimbing ledges

- interactable pressure plates, air fans, bounce pads

- item system with an inventory

- saving

- gamepad/keyboard aware UI

Controls(keyboard/gamepad):

WASD/Left stick to move

Mouse/Right stick to look

Space/A to jump

F/X to dash

E/B to interact

Esc/Start to pause

Tab/Select to open your Pocket menu
